meanings.definition: Things that make life easier or more comfortable.
meanings.sent1: Modern conveniences like dishwashers and washing machines save time and effort.
meanings.sent2: Having a car is a great convenience for getting around town.
meanings.sent3: The convenience of online shopping allows you to shop in your pajamas!
meanings.sent4: In a world without modern conveniences, daily life would be much more challenging.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of having a microwave makes preparing meals quick and simple.

meanings.definition: The state of being useful or helpful.
meanings.sent1: The convenience of having a map helped us find our way in the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent2: Her timely arrival was a great convenience during the hectic day.
meanings.sent3: It was a convenience to have an umbrella when the unexpected rain started.
meanings.sent4: The convenience of having a phone nearby in case of emergencies is reassuring.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of having a flashlight during the power outage was invaluable.

meanings.definition: Facilities or services that make life easier.
meanings.sent1: The hotel offers many conveniences such as room service and a gym.
meanings.sent2: Living in a neighborhood with nearby grocery stores is a great convenience.
meanings.sent3: The convenience of having a coffee shop downstairs makes mornings more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The convenience of having a public library within walking distance encourages reading.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of having a park nearby allows for relaxing outdoor activities.
